zip.description: The postal code or ZIP code of the address.

country.description: The full name of the country associated with the address.

city.description: The city where the customer resides.

address2.description: The second line of the customer's street address.

address1.description: The first line of the customer's street address.

last_name.description: The last name of the customer.

province_code.description: The code or abbreviation of the region or state.

country_code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the address country.

default.description: Indicates whether this is the default address for the customer.

province.description: The region or state where the customer resides.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the address was last updated.

phone.description: The phone number associated with the address.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop associated with the customer's address.

name.description: The full name of the customer associated with the address.

country_name.description: The name of the country associated with the address.

company.description: The company name associated with the customer's address.

id.description: The unique identifier of the address.

customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer to whom the address belongs.

first_name.description: The first name of the customer.
